songs.title: A Girl
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Hello!

[Verse 1]
I was straight up from day one
When you caught my eye in the sun
I could never give you a reason
All I really need is some fun

[Pre-Chorus]
Everywhere you go
I'll be there, you know

[Verse 2]
You said yes in a second
'Cause that's what you wanted too
We will always be one
All I really need is some fun

[Pre-Chorus]
Everywhere you go
I'll be there, you know

[Chorus]
But you're holdin' on to me
H-h-holdin' on to me
And you're tryna make a girl
Tr-tr-tryna make a girl

And you're holdin' on to me
H-h-holdin' on to me
And you're tryna make a girl
Out of me

[Verse 3]
Worn out shoes and cheap wine
You don't have to ask if I'm fine
Life's too short to make a deal
All I really need is some fun

[Pre-Chorus]
Everywhere you go
I'll be there, you know

[Chorus]
But you're holdin' on to me
H-h-holdin' on to me
And you're tryna make a girl
Tr-tr-tryna make a girl

And you're holdin' on to me
H-h-holdin' on to me
And you're tryna make a girl
Out of me

Out of me, out of me
Out of me, out of me
Out of me, out of me
Out of me, out of me
Out of me, out of me
Out of me, out of me
Out of me, out of me
Out of me, out of me
Out of me, out of me
Out of me, out of me
Out of me, out of me
Out of me, out of me
Out of me, out of me
Out of me, out of me
Out of me, out of me
Out of me

[Chorus]
But you're holdin' on to me
H-h-holdin' on to me
And you're tryna make a girl
Tr-tr-tryna make a girl

And you're holdin' on to me
H-h-holdin' on to me
And you're tryna make a girl
Out of me

[Chorus]
But you're holdin' on to me
H-h-holdin' on to me
And you're tryna make a girl
Tr-tr-tryna make a girl

And you're holdin' on to me
H-h-holdin' on to me
And you're tryna make a girl
Out of me
